column4: how do I make sure that ALL devices are unmountedd, because gparted gives the error: "Please unmount any logical partitions having a number higher than 5"      I dont beleive I have any filesystems mounted, thanks.
are you doing this from a live CD?
depending on the size of those partitions, that will take an enormous amount of time
time isnt the issue, the "Please unmount any logical partitions having a number higher than 5" is the main issue.
